GeneDef.label: royal jelly production
GeneDef.description: The carrier of this gene constantly exudes and produces globs of royal jelly, which provides some extra food for the colony.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Produces 12 units of royal jelly per day
This gene is balanced to produce more nutrition (0.05 * 12 = 0.6) than its metabolic impact (-1 -> 25%, which for a normal pawn is 0.4 nutrition per day)
Royal jelly boosts immunity, but will ultimately turn people into megaspiders
